basics.name: Yuhui Chen
basics.summary: Yuhui Chen is a Ph.D. student specializing in deep reinforcement learning and robotics control systems, with experience in embedded systems and offline reinforcement learning research.

education.institution: Chinese Academic of Science, Institution of Automation, 中科院自动化所
education.area: Deep Reinforcement Learning and robot control

education.institution: Beijing Institute of Technology, 北京理工大学

publications.name: Boosting continuous control with consistency policy
Generalizing Consistency Policy to Visual RL with Prioritized Proximal Experience Regularization
